Opening a file¶

Opening an HDF5 file using bapsflib.lapdhdf.File is done in the same manner as h5py.File, since bapsflib.lapdhdf.File inherits from h5py.File. The key difference is the default behavior for bapsflib.lapdhdf.File is to open the file in a ‘read-only’ mode.

from bapsflib import lapdhdf

f = lapdhdf.File('test.hdf5')

which is equivalent to

import h5py

f = h5py.File('test.hdf5', 'r')

Upon opening a file, lapdhdf.File generates an instance of lapdhdf.hdfchecks.hdfCheck that compares the structure of the loaded file to known structures generated by the Large Plasma Device (LaPD) DAQ system.
